name: Dream House Design: Tile Match
description:
Do you like home design and tile match-3 game? If the answer is yes, you must not miss this game . Here is a brand new home design game which melts with tile puzzle games in it. Solve fun Tile Master puzzles to help design, renovate, and decorate the rooms with us! Come play the Dream House Design!

Different from other "home design" games, you can also play tile match games here. And then, you'll become an interior designer and a tile master! Pass the match-3 levels to get coins to buy pretty furniture, enjoy the journey of your home design makeover, it will give you a feeling of calm, also exercise your eyesight and brain power.

Features
* Hundreds of match-3 levels will never make you feel bored!
* Luxurious decorations and exquisite furniture brings you visual satisfaction
* The sharp contrast between before and after renovation will give you spiritual satisfaction.
* Improve your design skills and gain inspiration that you can even apply in your real life.
* One game, two gameplay, the combination of match-3 games and home design games double your happiness!

What are you waiting for? Dive into Dream House Design now!
